title: Rasoul Korbekandi
text:
Mohammad Reza Rasoul Korbekandi (, born 27 January 1953) is a <a href="retired">retired</a> <a href="Iran">Iran</a>ian <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player and now manager.
He was a member of the <a href="Iran%20national%20football%20team">Iran</a> squad (as reserved goalkeeper) which participated at the <a href="1978%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1978 FIFA World Cup</a>.
